jot.physics.fluids.eulerian.linear_solvers

Class AbstractLinearSolver2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.physics.fluids.eulerian.linear_solvers.AbstractLinearSolver2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConjugateGradient2D, GaussSeidel2D, Jacobi2D, MultiGrid2D

    public abstract class AbstractLinearSolver2D
extends Object
    Abstract class that each linear solver must implement.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

      • linearSolver

        public abstract void linearSolver(int b,
                                  int iters,
                                  float[] x,
                                  float[] x0,
                                  float a,
                                  float c)
        Iterative linear system solver to use, e.g., Jacobi, Gauss-Seidel, SOR, Conjugate Gradient, Multigrid, etc.
        Parameters:
        b - orientation of the velocity or density component i.e., (x,y).
        iters - maximum of iterations to perform.
        x - a vector of velocities or densities.
        x0 - the old value of velocities and densities per grid cell.
        a -
        c -
